TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStateFormatter

summary.span: 定義型別為了將物件 Graph 序列化與還原序列化所實作的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that a type implements to serialize and deserialize an object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會定義型別可實作來序列化和還原序列化的 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項中維護狀態的方法及其屬性。The interface defines methods that a type can implement to serialize and deserialize the state that an ASP.NET Web server control maintains in its property. 此基礎結構由衍生自類別類別，來維護 ASP.NET 頁面的要求之間的狀態。This infrastructure is used by classes that derive from the class to maintain an ASP.NET page's state between requests. 根據預設，ASP.NET 網頁狀態是序列化和還原序列化的執行個體所類別; 不過，站台和配接器開發人員可以實作上自己的類型，若要執行這項工作的介面。By default, ASP.NET page state is serialized and deserialized by an instance of the class; however, site and adapter developers can implement the interface on their own types to perform this work. 如需有關 Web 伺服器控制項狀態管理和檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))並[動態的 Web 伺服器控制項和檢視狀態](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1ea6a66-3307-4c98-8187-cad462e1c027)。For more information about Web server control state management and view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)) and [Dynamic Web Server Controls and View State](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c1ea6a66-3307-4c98-8187-cad462e1c027). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立將檢視和控制項的狀態儲存至資料流中，Web 伺服器的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a object that saves view and control state to a stream on the Web server. `StreamPageStatePersister`類別會示範如何覆寫和方法來擷取並儲存頁面狀態資訊。The `StreamPageStatePersister` class demonstrates how to override the and methods to extract and save page state information. 這些方法會使用介面繼承自類別來序列化和還原序列化檢視狀態。These methods use the interface inherited from the class to serialize and deserialize view state. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Deserialize(string serializedState) cil managed
Public Function Deserialize (serializedState As String) As Object

param.name: serializedState
param.span: 還原序列化為初始化物件的字串。

span.span: A string that the deserializes into an initialized object.

summary.span: 將已序列化成字串形式的物件狀態圖還原序列化。

span.span: Deserializes an object state graph from its serialized string form.

returns.span: 代表 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項狀態的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the state of an ASP.NET server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以重新構成 ASP.NET 頁面或伺服器控制項使用已序列化的狀態物件方法。Use the method to reconstitute the state object for an ASP.NET page or server control that has been serialized using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法載入檢視狀態資訊。The following code example demonstrates how the method loads view state information. 方法`StreamPageStatePersister`類別會使用介面繼承自類別，以還原序列化檢視狀態。The method of the `StreamPageStatePersister` class uses the interface inherited from the class to deserialize view state. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Serialize(object state) cil managed
Public Function Serialize (state As Object) As String

param.name: state
param.span: 代表要序列化成字串形式之 Web 伺服器控制項檢視狀態的物件。

span.span: The object that represents the view state of the Web server control to serialize to string form.

summary.span: 將 ASP.NET Web 伺服器控制項狀態序列化成字串的形式。

span.span: Serializes ASP.NET Web server control state to string form.

returns.span: 代表 Web 伺服器控制項檢視狀態的字串。

span.span: A string that represents a Web server control's view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，轉換成字串格式的物件狀態圖。Use the method to transform an object state graph to string form. 重新建構所需的狀態物件，從字串使用方法。Reconstitute a state object from the string using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何方法保存至檔案的檢視狀態資訊。The following code example demonstrates how the method persists view state information to a file. 方法`StreamPageStatePersister`類別會使用介面繼承自類別來序列化檢視狀態。The method of the `StreamPageStatePersister` class uses the interface inherited from the class to serialize view state. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_2/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]
